lenders.name: George

lenders.occupational_info: I work as Advocate (Lawyer) for more than 33 years. I have my own Law Office. I think that the Advocate occupation is very interesting and very useful. The Advocates from the years of the Athenian Republic are or better must be the guardians of the Democracy. There is no Advocate without freedom of  the thought or freedom of the speech.  I like my Greek language and I write novels and short stories and poems. This is a way to express my mind and my soul...
